headline: Constellation Brands’ (STZ) Earnings Growth and Shift Toward Beer Business
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Consumer Stocks to Buy for a Retirement Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) stands against other consumer stocks to buy for a retirement stock portfolio. Today’s retirees face growing uncertainty about the future of Social Security. While […]
